args: And so now I put this here aaaand...\nOkay-doke! I think that did it!
With everything finally prepped, I now\ndeclare the long-awaited second branch\nof the Nina Shop open for business!
It's the new store I dreamed of opening...\nand the one I deceived all my friends\nin order to acquire.
Still, I gotta do my best. If I don't bust\nmy hump to make it a roaring success,\nI'll never be able to face them again.
And speaking of momentous occasions,\nit's my first customer! Welcome to the\nNorth Grastaea branch of the Nina Shop!
I...I need medicine! Please, give me all\nyou have! My companion is badly hurt!
What?! That's terrible! Hold on,\nlet me grab it!
Thank you! My friend is at the inn,\nso please come with me!
It looks like your medicine helped.
I'm glad. But how was he injured\nin the first place?
We were traveling in the wilds when a\nfiend showed up. We tried to fight back,\nbut it was just too strong.
Just when I thought we were done for,\nsome passers-by showed up to help and\nwe managed to escape with our lives.
They were truly kind souls—I think their\nleader went by ＂{player_name}＂?
I sure do. Also, helping a total stranger he\nhappens to be passing by is SERIOUSLY\non point for him.
Anyway, don't worry about a thing.\nThey're stronger than dirt, so I'm sure\nthey've got that fiend all wrapped up.
I hope you're right, because that was the\ntoughest fiend I'd ever seen.
It had an unusually thick hide—my blade\ncouldn't even dent the thing!
If your friends aren't as tough as you say,\nthey're probably in a world of hurt\nright about now.
(Oh geez, what should I do? I'm worried\nabout my friends, but without my magical\ndevice, I don't know if I can even help.)
(Okay, calm down, Nina. They've survived\ntons of dangerous battles before this, so\nthey don't need you trying to save the day.)
(In fact, this same thing happened back\nwhen I met {player_name}...)

The Dyrenell Empire is requisitioning all
the goods in this shop! Rejoice and be
honored that you are granted the chance
to aid our great nation!
Stop it, you goons!! My business will go\ndown the outhouse if you take everything!

Back then, South Grastaea was in chaos due to
the Dyrenell Empire. Real customers had fled,
and the imperial soldiers were utter tyrants.
The poor Nina Shop was in real trouble.
And then, a gallant figure appeared and saved me.
I know things are tough, but just hold out a\nlittle longer. I'm going to bring happiness\nback to this land—I promise!
And just as he said, he and his friends fought\nthe Other and his empire and defeated them both.
And then, thanks to his regular business, my\nshop got out of the rut it was in and was able to\nprosper.
(You know, when I think about it,\nthe prince is ALWAYS helping me out.)
(Not only did he create a foothold for me\nin the north, he's been patronizing my\nstore all this time!)
(He's basically my hero—and if my hero\nis in danger, then gosh darn it, I'm gonna\nget out there and help!)
Take me to the place you were attacked!
I have to go there right now!\nI have to help {player_name}!
Help him? Aren't you a merchant?
Yep, and that is precisely how I'm\ngonna help. I've got GOODS, baby!
The Nina Shop has all of the hottest\nmust-have items for both your travel\nAND fiend-slaying needs!
This thing's tougher than a week-old steak!
I'm sorry, but my mana is exhausted...
Hey, do you guys hear that?!\nIt sounds like a cart!
Nina?! What are you doing here?!
I loaded this cart up with medicine and\ntons of other useful goodies.
Think of it as a ＂Bleeding Profits＂ sale.\nNow take what you need, free of charge!
Holy crap, you are a LIFESAVER!
Oh yeah, come to Papa... YOINK!\nHere ya go, boss!
This should be enough to keep me going!
This elixir should help you, Cleo!
Oh, but this is incredible! I feel mana\nsurging back into my body!
And now I've got a little something for\nthat fiend... IT'S CLOSING TIME, CREEP!
It's a salve used for tanning leather\nthat should soften up that tough hide.
IT'S TIME TO THUMP A CHUMP!\nOOOH YEAAAH!
Hot diggity dog! The hide's still tough,\nbut at least we can hurt the damn thing!
Permit me to finish it off! Haaah!
And we couldn't have done it without Nina.
But how did you know we were in trouble\nin the first place?
So that fella we helped out hightailed it\nright to yer shop, eh?
Wait. So ALL the tools and potions we just\nused were goods from your new store?!
Oh man, we went through that stuff like it\nwas going outta style! You're gonna be\nruined! RUINED, I TELLS YA!
Well, I'm definitely going to have to push\nthe grand opening back a bit.
I'm sorry your dream is being put on hold\nbecause you helped us, Nina.
Aw, don't even worry about it.
I'll restock the store and have it open\nwithin a fortnight—count on it!
Plus I was just thinking about this earlier,\nbut you're my hero!
A true merchant never forgets a debt,\nand this is the least I can do for a hero.
Well, you helped us out of a real jam,\nso thank you again.
No thanks required! Buuuut, I might bug\nyou for a teensy little favor if it's okay...
Please promise to drop in at the second\nbranch of the Nina Shop whenever you're\nin North Grastaea, okay?
That's not a favor, Nina—I was already\nplanning to do that anyway!
Well, let me thank you in advance for your\nbusiness at the Nina Shop, where you\nalways get service with a smile!
